datasets.name: Mergers and Acquisitions abroad by UK companies

lede: These statistics tell us about the changing picture of businesses operating in the UK. A merger occurs when two companies or organisations of a similar size agree to join together in order to operate as one single company under a new name. An acquisition is a transaction which involves one company purchasing the shares of a second company which is usually of a smaller size. Other statistics here are on 'disposals', which refers to a company or organisation selling or liquidating an asset or subsidiary.
name: Mergers and acquisitions
